name: yuya.ts.odata-client
description: OData Client for Typescript with axios

scripts.build: rimraf -r dist | npx tsc | npx tsc -m amd --outFile dist/yuya.ts.odata-client.amd.js | npx tsc -m system --outFile dist/yuya.ts.odata-client.system.js
scripts.buildtest: rimraf -r dist | npx tsc | npx tsc -m amd --outFile dist/yuya.ts.odata-client.amd.js | npx tsc -m system --outFile dist/yuya.ts.odata-client.system.js && cpx dist/**/* C:\Projects\TurkuazGO.VehicleShipment\src\TurkuazGO.VehicleShipment\TurkuazGO.VehicleShipment.Web\node_modules\yuya.ts.odata-client\dist\

author: Alper Konuralp
